page.title: 18Pocket Money
page.content: The most amount of pocket money is three pounds and the least amount is twenty pence.Most children in our class get one pound per week.Some people get their pocket money once a month.Only one person in our class doesn't get any pocket money.About seven people in our class have to work for their money.Most children have to pay their subscriptions from their pocket money. There are lots of jobs you can do to earn money.Some children help their older brothers and sisters to do their paper round,baby sitting,taking people's dogs for walks and doing old people's shopping.
